name.en: Introduction to statistical machine learning and its application
name.ch: 統計機器學習基礎與案例實作

department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch: 機器學習必需基於統計的，以收集而來的數據基於統計學框架來進行描述，產生一足夠解釋數據的模型，以其對類似資料進行分群預測，本課程將從集合與機率，並將傳統基礎的統計模型的估計及各種檢定進行介紹，並進階從到線性迴歸、多元線性迴歸及羅吉斯迴歸，至分類模型的建立，以及特徵可能提取方式及統計降維法如主成分分析、線性判別分析。同時也將涵蓋深度學習的基礎概念，及參數常規化解決模型過擬合的問題，最終結合實作，使修習完這門課程的同學們可應用相同的概念及手法延伸至感興趣的主題中。
goal.en: Statistics is fundamental for machine learning. Machine learning attempts to create a model that can describe the data collected in terms of statistical estimation. The derived model can categorize the data recruited from similar conditions. The course starts with the basic statistical concepts of probability theory, estimate statistics, and common statistical distributions. Then, the regression models, including linear regression, multiple regression, logistic regression, and several classifiers will be introduced. In addition, the course also covered the basics of feature extractions and methods for dimension reduction, such as principal component analysis and linear discriminant analysis. Finally, the overview of modern deep learning and the norms for regularization will be discussed. In combination with practical examples, we hope the students can apply the learned concepts and skills to the topics they encounter in the real-world.
